intro: Take the stage as Princess Peach to save the theater in this action game
description:
Masked villains named Grape and the Sour Bunch have taken over the Sparkle Theater and turned all of its plays into disasters! Now it’s up to Peach and the theater’s guardian, Stella, to take the stage and use the power of Sparkle to get things back to normal. Help the performers make the theater shine bright again by using Peach’s ribbon and transformations!

Play like a princess and transform to save the day with showstopping abilities 
 
Within each play, Peach will magically transform to match that play’s setting. Show off fancy swordplay and slash your way through a storybook play as Swordfighter Peach, or wrangle up outlaws with a lasso as Cowgirl Peach in a western-style one. Each transformation has its own abilities to keep the action fun and fresh—one moment you may be sneaking around as Ninja Peach, and the next you may be singing as Mermaid Peach. She’s the hero each performance needs!

Whisk up tasty treats as Patissiere Peach. Defend against aliens with Mighty Peach’s super strength. Spin and jump on ice as Figure Skater Peach. Infiltrate the base with Dashing Thief Peach’s gadgets. Sleuth for clues as Detective Peach and find out whodunnit. Kick and punch as Kung Fu Peach. There are lots of transformations waiting behind the curtain!

Outfits, challenges, and collectibles to suit your style

While Peach’s abilities will change throughout the game, the controls will remain simple so players of all ages can take the stage as Peach. You can also equip the Heart Charm to give Peach three extra hearts if you find the gameplay a bit challenging. 

After completing a floor in the Sparkle Theater, take on challenging Action Rehearsals and see how long you can survive without taking damage! The first time you get a gold rank in these challenging plays, you’ll receive in-game rewards to change up Peach and Stella’s outfits. Change the patterns on Peach’s dress and Stella’s ribbon to suit your style. Find even more patterns in the theater’s shop or hidden within plays.

There’s still more to uncover—including collectible Sparkle Gems, as well as movie and sound galleries to replay your favorite moments.

Free demo available now!

Experience two plays and two of Peach’s transformations in the free Nintendo eShop demo.
